headline: Boeing Order Surge And Spirit Deal Tested By Production Risks
summary: Boeing (NYSE:BA) reported a surge in commercial airplane orders and deliveries, including large commitments from Air India and Ethiopian Airlines. The company completed its acquisition of Spirit AeroSystems, bringing a key fuselage and components supplier fully in house. Management highlighted a record backlog and plans for production ramp up, while acknowledging ongoing production challenges and regulatory scrutiny. Boeing sits at the center of global commercial aviation, with its jets...
